name: ragarock-retrograde-jam
description:
Hi, this game has not been finished due to me not having the time to work on it currently, but i wanted it to at least publish it on the jam.

Source code: https://git.ragarock.moe/retrograde-jam/

The entire source code is GPLv3 licensed unless otherwise specified.

Controls: menu / ingame

  • wasd = movement
  • j = accept

Controls: editor

  • wasd movement
  • j = place under cursor
  • k = open menu / close menu
  • u and i = switch tileset when in menu
  • u = delete under cursor
  • i = save tilemap

Tilemaps get saved over the res/levels/{bg.dat,fg.dat} files
which are also the actual level  maps.
